A few words about EPAM:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":122006,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/dfb9ab82-12ad-4e69-ac4b-9779ad36bd80/Capture1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/dfb9ab82-12ad-4e69-ac4b-9779ad36bd80/Capture1.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture1.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"dfb9ab82-12ad-4e69-ac4b-9779ad36bd80\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":768,\"height\":514},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you haven’t had an opportunity to learn about the company yet, please follow the link to learn more. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.epam.com/about\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://www.epam.com/about\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You must be interested in how everything works in such a large company, and what factors contribute to its rapid growth and development. So, let’s get started and learn more about the people and opportunities!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":141759,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0b6ead64-663c-4edb-b26d-c90646ea37ba/Capture2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0b6ead64-663c-4edb-b26d-c90646ea37ba/Capture2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture2.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0b6ead64-663c-4edb-b26d-c90646ea37ba\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":908,\"height\":268},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
